ProteinName	E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase TRIM50 (EC 2.3.2.27) (RING-type E3 ubiquitin transferase TRIM50) (Tripartite motif-containing protein 50)
GeneName	TRIM50 TRIM50A
Length	486
Function	E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase that ubiquitinates Beclin-1/BECN1 in a 'Lys-63'-dependent manner enhancing its binding to ULK1 (PubMed:29604308). In turn, promotes starvation-induced autophagy activation. Also interacts with p62/SQSTM1 protein and thereby induces the formation and the autophagy clearance of aggresome-associated polyubiquitinated proteins through HDAC6 interaction (PubMed:22792322). Also promotes NLRP3 inflammasome activation by directly inducing NLRP3 oligomerization independent of its E3 ligase function (By similarity).
